nodes.documentation: @dev This function allow a whitelisted user to purchase tokens
nodes.name: purchaseTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev This function allow the update of the purchase limit
@param _newLimit How many token per ether
nodes.name: setPurchaseLimit
updateRate
withdrawEth
withdrawToken

nodes.documentation: @dev This function allow a whitelisted user to purchase tokens
nodes.name: purchaseTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev This function allow the update of the purchase limit
@param _newLimit How many token per ether
nodes.name: setPurchaseLimit
updateRate
withdrawEth
withdrawToken

purchaseTokens().details: This function allow a whitelisted user to purchase tokens

setPurchaseLimit(uint256).details: This function allow the update of the purchase limit

updateRate(uint256).details: This function allow a valid signer to update of the rate on the contractThe rate must always be an integer greater than 0

withdrawEth(address,uint256).details: This function allow a valid signer to retrieve eth

params._to: Address that will receive the ether

withdrawToken(address,uint256,address).details: This function allow a valid signer to retrieve tokens

params._to: Address that will receive the ether
params._token: Token to retrieve (works for external stucked tokens)
